sentences.en: Sturgeon fishing has been pretty good in the estuary.
sentences.cn: 鲟鱼捕捞在这个河口一直很好。

sentences.en: The canal was built to connect Sheffield with the Humber estuary.
sentences.cn: 修建这条运河是为了将设菲尔德和亨伯河河口连接起来。

sentences.en: The river opens up suddenly into a broad estuary.
sentences.cn: 河面突然变宽，形成了一个宽阔的河湾。
